item.title: CVE-2022-38086|2024-09-16T17:19:15.002Z -- vladimir%20anokhin -- shortcodes%20ultimate%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Shortcodes Ultimate plugin <= 5.12.0 at WordPress leading to plugin preset settings change.
